text:
[redacted_name] — Oque? — Seu olhar transmitia curiosidade.
Suspiro. Estou nervosa para contar a eles. Obviamente eles vão ficar bem mal por isso! Se bem que ainda iremos se falar pelo celular mas.. não vai ser a mesma coisa.
[redacted_name] — Fale logo, sn! é bom ou ruim? — Sorrir.
Sn — Péssimo. — Observo o sorriso de [redacted_name] se desfazer.
[redacted_name] apenas esperava eu contar assim como [redacted_name]. Quando eu disse que era péssimo o olhar deles ficaram com um semblante mais curioso.
Sn — Eu... — Olho para o chão. — Eu vou me mudar pra arábia saudita. — Termino.
Olhei para eles vendo eles incrédulos. [redacted_name] já mostrava que estava mal assim como[redacted_name]O [redacted_name] apenas ficava me observando com um olhar tipo: "Está falando sério?"
[redacted_name] — Vo-você está mentindo, né? — Nego com a cabeça.
Eles entreolham e já posso ver os olhos da [redacted_name] encher de água. Sinto uma pontada no peito.
trans:
[redacted_name] — What? — Their eyes were filled with curiosity.
I sighed. I'm nervous to tell them. Obviously, they're going to be really upset about it! Although we'll still be able to talk on the phone, but... it won't be the same.
[redacted_name] — Come on, sn! Is it good or bad? — They smiled.
Sn — Terrible. — I watched [redacted_name]'s smile fade.
[redacted_name] was just waiting for me to tell them, just like [redacted_name]. When I said it was terrible, their expression became more curious.
Sn — I... — I looked down. — I'm moving to Saudi Arabia. — I finished.
I looked at them and saw their disbelief. [redacted_name] was already looking upset, just like [redacted_name]. [redacted_name] just stared at me with a look like, "Are you serious?"
[redacted_name] — Yo-you're kidding, right? — I shook my head.
They looked at each other and I could already see tears welling up in [redacted_name]'s eyes. My heart ached.
